scenes.text:
Welcome to the Vegetarian and Vegan society!

Whether you're interested in cutting out meat or dairy altogether, or want to find fellow veggie's in the university, then this society is for you.

We share cheap recipes and local news about new veggie places and products to keep our meals interesting and wallets full.

We welcome anyone with an interest, regardless of diet choices, so come join us for some animal-friendly fun!
We don't have a specific day, but specific date and times for socials we run can be found on our SU page and our Instagram.
Our membership is Â£1.00 for the year!

As a society we strive to discover Cardiff's finest vegetarian and vegan experiences with trips to various restaurants and events.

We are looking forward to planning amazing socials, most related to being vegan/veggie and others just to have fun together as a group of like minded friends.
